plays.text: Penalty to Vladimir Malakhov 2 minutes for Tripping Shawn McEachern

Penalty to Curtis Leschyshyn 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike York

Penalty to Theo Fleury 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
